page.title: 12CHALFONT AREA RELIGION
page.content: BAPTIST CHURCH Our local Baptist Church is quite popular on Sundays. In the morning service about 700 people attend. During the week other groups, including youth club, meet for social activities and during the summer holidays camps are held for various age groups.On Sunday afternoons the church orchestra and choir meet for practice and tea.The church has also purchased several houses which it runs as old folks homes. THE PARISH CHURCH is the oldest building in the village and has been rebuilt several times. The choir and bellringers meet regularly and many other groups are closely attached to the church, including youth clubs,young wives and Sunday School.
